headline: Is CF Industries (CF) Price Justified After Recent Gains And Mixed Valuation Signals
summary: If you are wondering whether CF Industries Holdings is offering good value at around US$86.75 per share, this article walks through what the current price might be implying. The stock has seen mixed returns, with gains of 4.7% over the last 7 days and 10.2% over 30 days, alongside an 8.3% return year to date, a 5.1% decline over 1 year, 9.5% over 3 years, and 130.5% over 5 years. summary: Earlier this month, CF Industries Holdings announced that Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer Gregory D. Cameron will leave the company on February 15, 2026, with long-time vice president, corporate controller and chief accounting officer Richard A. Hoker stepping in as interim CFO.
